Lettuce ( Lactuca sativa L.) plant is very sensitive towards soil hydrocarbons
9 . Lettuce seed and growth bioassays can be effectively used for the evaluation of soil toxicity due to contamination
10 . Seed germination assays, particularly of lettuce, can predict phytotoxicity of contaminated soils
11 . Marti et al.
12 used lettuce growth parameters as an indicator of the toxicity of soil samples.
